answers.answer: 10wks and I'm just light headed... And I have burst of dizziness and I sleep alot other than that everything is going good
Get your sleep on, mama! I've never loved sleeping as much as I do now :) Glad all is well for you!
11 weeks on Saturday. Mostly icky stomach, but can't tell if it's nausea or constipation. Looking forward to a more regular diet
For constipation I was recommended Benefiber. You can find it at any local grocery store. It's really helped me! But I also eat lots of fiber food. Hope everything continues to go well for you :)
Nausea, heart burn, sore nipples (not the breast) and fatigue for me!
I'm 11w5d:) still extremely nauseous:( but almost to second trimester I have my glucose test tomorrow(I had gd with my last baby) and get to set up another sono:)
10 weeks 3 days :) sickly, achy lower back, sore boobs and so very tired! Due 12-14th July, won't know for definite until my first scan on Jan 2nd. Can't wait :)
I see. Well wish you the best & hope it all goes well :)Aaaah, all these awesome symptoms.The spoils of pregnancy, right ladies? Lol

question: I'm so happy! So far so good. Still have sore boobies, nausea, but I'm ok with that.Anyone else same as me? If not, how far are you?
title: ♡ 11 weeks today ♡
